Sweeping Gore.name: Sweeping Gore
Sweeping Gore.flavor: You catch your foe on your horns and toss it out of the way,
keywords:
Melee 1

Requirement: You must charge and use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength + 6 vs. AC
Sweeping Gore.requirement: You must charge and use this power in place of a melee basic attack.
Sweeping Gore.attack:
Strength + 6 vs. AC
Increase to Strength + 8 at 21st level.
Sweeping Gore.onHit: 2d10 + Strength modifier damage, and the target slides 2 squares.

Thrashing Horns.name: Thrashing Horns
Thrashing Horns.flavor: You swing your horns in a deadly arc, catching those who are off their guard.
Thrashing Horns.effect: Whenever you hit an enemy with an opportunity attack, you deal an additional 1d6 damage and push the target 1 square.

Giant's Sweep.name: Giant's Sweep
Giant's Sweep.flavor: With a vicious sweep of your weapon, you drive your foes down before you.
Giant's Sweep.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, the target is pushed 2 squares and knocked prone.
Giant's Sweep.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is pushed 2 squares, but is not knocked prone.
